Project.title: Violence detection
Project.description: This repository contains the codes for our PAPER on violence detection titled Efficient Two-Stream Network for Violence Detection Using Separable Convolutional LSTM which is accepted to be presented at Int'l Joint Conference on Neural Networks (IJCNN) 2021.

Project.title: Cat and dog detection
Project.description: Deep Neural Network for image classification. The comparison shows that 4-layer neural network has better performance (80%) than your 2-layer neural network (72%) on the same test set.

Project.title: SwiftEats
Project.description: CNN and sepConvLstm are used to extract features that are passed to the classifier and Achieved 89.75 percent accuracy

Project.title: ManagetIt
Project.description: It is a web application that allows users to manage their inventory and keep track of their products. To login use email: test@gmail.com & password: test

Project.title: Simple Messenger
Project.description: A simple messenger app that allows users to send messages to each other.

Project.title: Virtual Classroom
Project.description: A virtual classroom app that allows users to create and join virtual classrooms.

Project.title: Phonebook
Project.description: A phonebook app that allows users to add, edit, delete and search contacts.

Project.title: Battleship
Project.description: Battleship is a simple console based c++ plus game. You will provide battleship the co-ordinates either horizontal or vertical and x-y coordinates 0-9 for the position to attack the enemy ship.
